alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:36PM CDT until August 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 435 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Springfield, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield... Nixa... Ozark... Battlefield... Fremont Hills... Brookline... Galloway... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 75 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
